channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 烈酒制造商面临中国欧盟白兰地调查
item.description: China has launched an anti-dumping investigation on brandy imported from the European Union, a step that appears to be mainly targeted at France.翻译:中国对欧盟进口白兰地发起反倾销调查，此举似乎主要针对法国。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 北京称马尔代夫总统将于1月8日至12日访华
item.description: The president of the Maldives, Mohamed Muizzu, will pay a state visit to China from Jan. 8 to 12, the Chinese foreign ministry said in statement on Friday, in what would be a high-profile snub to the island nation's huge neighbour India.翻译:中国外交部周五在声明中表示，马尔代夫总统穆罕默德·穆伊祖将于 1 月 8 日至 12 日对中国进行国事访问，这将是对该岛国巨大邻国印度的高调冷落。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 行业专家对中国对欧盟白兰地反倾销调查做出回应
item.description: China launched on Friday an anti-dumping investigation into brandy imported from the European Union, which will focus on brandy in containers of less than 200 litres (44 British gallons).翻译:中国周五对从欧盟进口的白兰地发起反倾销调查，调查重点是200升（44英国加仑）以下容器的白兰地。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 王毅：中美合作“不再是一种选择……而是势在必行”
item.description: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi said on Friday the most urgent task for Sino-U.S. relations is to establish a correct understanding and cooperation between the two sides, stressing it is "no longer an option ... but an imperative" for the world.翻译:中国外交部长王毅周五表示，中美关系最紧迫的任务是双方建立正确的理解与合作，并强调这对世界“不再是一种选择……而是势在必行”。
item.author: Liz Lee, Ethan Wang

item.title: 中国财富管理公司中植申请破产清算
item.description: Chinese wealth manager Zhongzhi Enterprise Group has filed for bankruptcy liquidation after failing to repay debt, as the firm grapples with a deepening property market downturn.翻译:中国财富管理公司中植企业集团因未能偿还债务而申请破产清算，该公司正努力应对房地产市场日益低迷的局面。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 贝莱德任命范华接替唐朝为中国区总裁 - 消息人士
item.description: BlackRock Inc has appointed Hua Fan, formerly general manager of its majority-owned China asset management unit, as head of China, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.翻译:两名知情人士称，贝莱德公司已任命其控股的中国资产管理部门前总经理范华为中国区负责人。
item.author: Selena Li

item.title: 童话般的冰雕吸引大批游客来到中国哈尔滨
item.description: China's annual Ice and Snow Festival, with its fairy-tale ice sculptures, opened on Friday attracting throngs of tourists who shuffled carefully over the slippy ice and snow and dragged their children in sledges around the park.翻译:中国一年一度的冰雪节周五开幕，童话般的冰雕吸引了大批游客，他们小心翼翼地在光滑的冰雪上拖行，拖着孩子乘坐雪橇在公园里转悠。
item.author: Nicoco Chan, Liz Lee

item.title: 监管机构称特斯拉将在中国维修 162 万辆汽车
item.description: Tesla is doing an effective recall on 1.62 million vehicles, including its models S, X, 3 and Y in China, the market regulator said on Friday.翻译:市场监管机构周五表示，特斯拉正在中国有效召回 162 万辆汽车，包括其 S、X、3 和 Y 车型。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 赛默飞停止在西藏销售法医技术
item.description: Thermo Fisher Scientific has pledged to stop selling forensic technology and equipment in Tibet that could be used for identifying individuals, a spokesperson for the company said.翻译:赛默飞世尔科技发言人表示，该公司已承诺停止在西藏销售可用于识别个人身份的法医技术和设备。
item.author: Andrew Silver

item.title: 菲律宾国家安全顾问对中国外交保持开放态度
item.description: The Philippines remains open to diplomatic discussions with China and believes the two nations can achieve a resolution to disputes over the South China Sea through peaceful dialogue, its national security adviser said in a statement on Friday.翻译:菲律宾国家安全顾问周五在一份声明中表示，菲律宾仍对与中国进行外交讨论持开放态度，并相信两国可以通过和平对话解决南海争端。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：中国推动股票基金推出以支持股市 - 消息人士
item.description: Beijing has informally asked some money managers in China to prioritise the launch of equity funds over other products like bond funds, four sources with direct knowledge of the matter said, as authorities scramble to revive its lagging stock market.翻译:四位直接了解此事的消息人士称，随着当局忙于重振落后的股市，北京方面已非正式地要求中国的一些基金经理优先推出股票基金，而不是债券基金等其他产品。
item.author: Yu Xie, Samuel Shen

item.title: 2024 年初台湾选举对美国稳定与中国关系的目标构成考验
item.description: Taiwan's election next week poses challenges for Washington no matter who wins, with a victory for the ruling party sure to exacerbate tensions with China while an opposition triumph may raise awkward questions about the island's defense policies.翻译:台湾下周的选举无论谁获胜都会给华盛顿带来挑战，执政党的胜利肯定会加剧与中国的紧张关系，而反对派的胜利可能会引发有关台湾国防政策的尴尬问题。
item.author: Michael Martina, David Brunnstrom

item.title: 朝鲜向韩国军事“歹徒”海上发射炮火
item.description: North Korea fired more than 200 artillery rounds on Friday near a disputed maritime border with South Korea in another escalation of tension between the rivals and prompting the South to take "corresponding" action with live fire drills.翻译:朝鲜周五在与韩国有争议的海上边界附近发射了 200 多发炮弹，两国之间的紧张局势再次升级，并促使韩国采取“相应”行动，进行实弹演习。
item.author: Ju-Min Park, Soo-Hyang Choi

item.title: 特斯拉凭借实时策略在中国销售效率超越比亚迪
item.description: Tesla's strategy in China of real-time, aggressive management of its sales staff is giving its stores an edge over dealerships offering BYD and other brands in the world's largest auto market, according to three people with knowledge of the matter.翻译:据三名知情人士透露，特斯拉在中国的战略是对销售人员进行实时、积极的管理，这使其门店比在全球最大汽车市场上销售比亚迪和其他品牌的经销商更具优势。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 议员要求五角大楼考虑禁止美国投资中国移远通信
item.description: The top Republican and Democrat on the U.S. House of Representatives' China committee on Thursday asked the Biden administration to consider adding China's Quectel Wireless to a list of Chinese military companies.翻译:美国众议院中国委员会共和党和民主党最高领导人周四要求拜登政府考虑将中国移远无线公司列入中国军工企业名单。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 香港大亨律师就证人酷刑指控向联合国提出上诉
item.description: Lawyers for Hong Kong pro-democracy tycoon Jimmy Lai said on Thursday they had appealed to the United Nations expert on torture over the treatment of a witness they believe was tortured before giving incriminating evidence.翻译:香港民主大亨黎智英的律师周四表示，他们已就一名证人在提供定罪证据之前受到酷刑的待遇问题向联合国酷刑问题专家提出上诉。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 尽管与一家智能手机制造商达成协议，诺基亚在中国的专利纠纷仍然存在
item.description: Finnish telecom equipment maker Nokia said on Thursday it had signed a 5G patent agreement with one of China's leading smartphone makers Honor, but its legal battles with other Chinese companies over patents continue.翻译:芬兰电信设备制造商诺基亚周四表示，已与中国领先的智能手机制造商之一荣耀签署了 5G 专利协议，但其与其他中国公司的专利法律纠纷仍在继续。
item.author: Anne Kauranen

item.title: 菲律宾军方：两艘中国船只尾随菲律宾和美国船只
item.description: Two Chinese navy vessels shadowed Philippines and U.S. ships conducting joint patrols in the South China Sea, the Philippine military said on Thursday, as tensions flare in the region over disputed territorial claims.翻译:菲律宾军方周四表示，两艘中国海军舰艇跟踪在南海进行联合巡逻的菲律宾和美国船只，因为该地区因领土主张争议而紧张局势加剧。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 经过一年的事故和灾害，中国将解决安全风险
item.description: China said on Thursday it plans a three-year campaign to tackle problems hampering response times during disasters and accidents including production safety lapses in sectors like mining.翻译:中国周四表示，计划开展为期三年的行动，以解决灾害和事故中影响反应速度的问题，包括采矿等行业的生产安全失误。
item.author: Reuters
